Killer mother who left her five children in New Zealand subject of new crime documentary https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/killer-mother-who-left-her- Five-children-in-new-zealand-subject-of-new-crime-documentary/Z3NIMU5UJVE6NP7FLBEKGF6P3Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/killer-mother-who-left-her- Five-children-in-new-zealand-subject-of-new-crime-documentary/Z3NIMU5UJVE6NP7FLBEKGF6P3Y/ Her victim's mummified corpse was found in the backyard 18 years after the murder. Tenants kept awake by cockroaches ‘scuttling across ceiling’ awarded $12,000 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tenants-kept-awake-by-cockroaches-scutdling-across-ceiling-awarded-12k/IBDZH5LZTZHFVMMPJTTKTHCNFQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tenants-kept-awake-by-cockroaches-scutdling-across-ceiling-awarded-12k/IBDZH5LZTZHFVMMPJTTKTHCNFQ/ Tracy NealThe residents were paying $1300 per week to live in the house. Sun, 18 Aug 2024 02:00:00 +0000 A photo of American sewer cockroaches invading a home in Epsom, Auckland. It's unclear what type of cockroach kept the tenants involved in a recent Tenancy Tribunal case up at night, but the rental was costing them $1300 a week. Photo / NZ Herald
